name: Ghana
text: Ghana feels most aggrieved that the side that did almost all of the attacking ending up without a single point.

name: Portugal
text: Yeah, they were humiliated by Germany, but why focus on that when there are beautiful women around? Correio da Manha continued its "Beauties of the World Cup" series with a look at Sami Khedira's girlfriend, while also noting that Rihanna was sad to see Ronaldo lose.

name: Germany
text: Over at kicker, they are memorializing Thomas Muller's impressive goal record--8 in 7 games after yesterday's hat-trick--by seeing how that matches up to the greats of Germany's past.

name: Mexico
text: The Mexican press isn't sweating today's Brazil match, reassured by their history as Brazil's bugaboo: "The most bitter pill for Brazil in recent years was tequila, when Mexico took his hands Gold in the Olympics, only title they have never won in their soccer history."

name: Korea
text: South Korea is worried about Russia's manager: "Capello is renowned for building strong defenses, carrying on the tradition of the Italian "catenaccio" or chain system [...] With his strong charisma, Capello is well placed to implement his defensive tactics."

name: Brazil
text: One paper has a gallery of protest pictures around the country.

name: Spain
text: AS wasn't to impressed the USMNT's performance last night: "Ghana was better but sank due to a lack of concentration."
